content:
Baghestan
Baghestan (Persian: باغستان‎; formerly, Khademabad (Persian: خادم آباد), also Romanized as Khādemābād and Khādamābād; also known as Khādemābād-e Qods and Muslemabad)[2] is a city in the Central District of Shahriar County, Tehran Province, Iran.  At the 2006 census, its population was 52,330, in 12,810 families.[3]

Transportation
The city is served by buses from the municipal-run Baghestan City and Suburbs Bus Organization, connecting the city to Shahriar and Tehran.
